actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on HELP.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to increase the amount of loan forgiveness for teachers.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 (HEA) to increase the amount of student loan forgiveness for teachers under Federal Family Education Loan and Direct Loan programs. Prohibits any borrower from receiving double benefits, for the same teaching or other service, from student loan forgiveness under both HEA and the National and Community Service Act of 1990.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to increase the amount of loan forgiveness for teachers.
